title: How to write the date in English - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing a date in English means the month first, date second and then year last. In Europe the date is first, then the month, then the year. For example in the USA today is December 6, 2017 or abbreviated 12/6/2017. In Europe it is written 6/12/2017. Written out that is 6th of December, 2017.
